name: WeeklyMeals
0:
”Alexa open weekly meals”
”Alexa tell weekly meals I'm going to make steak on Wednesday”
”Alexa ask weekly meals what am I having tomorrow for dinner”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weekly meals
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Weekly Meals is here to help you keep track of what you are going to eat. Whether cooking or going out, simply tell Weekly Meals what you're having every day of the week and we'll remember. Not sure what you're having on Wednesday? It's ok to skip.

Premium users get advanced features such as the ability to move meals when you change your mind, and analytics about what it is that you are eating (how often do you really have tacos?)

Check us out at https://phillipsoft.com/weekly-meals/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
